name: Bravo Fighter
Lore: 'Flown by an unknown pilot who likes to spin a lot. Played the deciding role in the attack against the Droid Control Ship.',
Text: 'Permanent pilot provides ability of 3. During your control phase, if landed aboard Blockade Flagship, may draw one destiny. If destiny > 6, place Bravo Fighter in your Used Pile; Flagship ''blown away.''',
